project.name: ToolBoxKit
project.description: React-based utility toolbox with converters, calculators, and digital tools

requirements.description: Application should properly route between different tool sections

test_cases.name: Home Page Navigation
test_cases.description: Verify home page loads correctly with tool navigation cards
test_cases.expected: All tool categories displayed with proper navigation

test_cases.name: Calculator Navigation
test_cases.description: Navigate to calculator section and verify sub-pages work
test_cases.expected: All calculator pages load without errors

test_cases.name: Converter Navigation
test_cases.description: Navigate to converter section and verify tabs work
steps: Switch between video, audio, image tabs
test_cases.expected: Converter tabs function correctly and content updates

test_cases.name: Unit Converter Navigation
test_cases.description: Navigate to unit converter and verify category tabs
steps: Switch between temperature, length, mass tabs
test_cases.expected: Unit converter categories load with appropriate tools

test_cases.name: Digital Tools Navigation
test_cases.expected: Digital tools section accessible with all utilities

requirements.description: Dark/light theme toggle should work consistently across all pages

test_cases.name: Theme Toggle Functionality
test_cases.description: Toggle between dark and light themes
test_cases.expected: Theme switches properly with persistent state

test_cases.name: Theme Persistence
test_cases.description: Verify theme preference persists across page refreshes
test_cases.expected: Theme preference saved and restored

test_cases.name: Theme Consistency
test_cases.description: Verify theme applies consistently across all components
test_cases.expected: All components respect theme selection

requirements.description: Calculator components should perform mathematical operations correctly

test_cases.name: Simple Calculator Basic Operations
test_cases.expected: All arithmetic operations return correct results

test_cases.name: Scientific Calculator Functions
test_cases.expected: Scientific functions return accurate results

test_cases.name: Interest Calculator
test_cases.expected: Interest calculations are mathematically correct

test_cases.name: Calculator Input Validation
test_cases.description: Test error handling for invalid inputs
test_cases.expected: Invalid inputs handled gracefully with error messages

requirements.description: Video converter should properly process video files with FFmpeg

test_cases.name: Video File Upload
test_cases.description: Test video file selection and upload interface
test_cases.expected: Video files upload successfully with proper validation

test_cases.name: FFmpeg Initialization
test_cases.description: Verify FFmpeg loads properly for video processing
test_cases.expected: FFmpeg loads successfully with proper CDN fallbacks

test_cases.name: Video Format Conversion
test_cases.expected: Video conversion completes with progress tracking

test_cases.name: Batch Video Conversion
test_cases.expected: Multiple files convert sequentially with progress updates

test_cases.name: Video Conversion Error Handling
test_cases.description: Test error scenarios in video conversion
test_cases.expected: Errors handled gracefully with user feedback

requirements.description: Audio converter should properly process audio files with FFmpeg

test_cases.name: Audio File Upload
test_cases.description: Test audio file selection and validation
test_cases.expected: Audio files upload with proper type checking

test_cases.name: Audio Format Conversion
test_cases.expected: Audio conversion processes successfully with quality settings

test_cases.name: Audio Quality Settings
test_cases.description: Test audio bitrate and sample rate options
test_cases.expected: Audio settings apply correctly to output file

test_cases.name: Batch Audio Conversion
test_cases.expected: Multiple files process with queue management

requirements.description: Image converter should handle various image format conversions

test_cases.name: Image File Upload
test_cases.description: Test image file selection and preview
test_cases.expected: Image files load with proper preview functionality

test_cases.name: Image Format Conversion
test_cases.expected: Image conversions maintain appropriate quality

test_cases.name: Image Quality Settings
test_cases.expected: Quality settings affect output appropriately

test_cases.name: Multiple Image Conversion
test_cases.expected: Multiple images convert with progress tracking

requirements.description: Unit converter components should perform accurate conversions

test_cases.name: Temperature Conversion
test_cases.expected: Temperature conversions are mathematically accurate

test_cases.name: Length Conversion
test_cases.expected: Length conversions use correct conversion factors

test_cases.name: Mass Conversion
test_cases.expected: Mass conversions are accurate

test_cases.name: Time Conversion
test_cases.expected: Time conversions work correctly

test_cases.name: Unit Converter Input Validation
test_cases.description: Test edge cases in unit conversions
test_cases.expected: Invalid inputs handled with appropriate error messages

requirements.description: Digital utilities should provide correct functionality

test_cases.name: QR Code Generator
test_cases.expected: QR codes generate successfully and are scannable

test_cases.name: Password Generator
test_cases.expected: Passwords generated according to specified criteria

test_cases.name: Color Picker
test_cases.expected: Color conversions between formats are accurate

test_cases.name: YouTube Downloader
test_cases.expected: YouTube URLs processed with appropriate interface

requirements.description: File upload, validation, and download should work reliably

test_cases.name: File Type Validation
test_cases.description: Test file type restrictions work correctly
steps: Try to upload wrong file type
test_cases.expected: File types validated correctly with clear error messages

test_cases.name: Multiple File Selection
steps: Verify all files appear in list
test_cases.expected: Multiple files managed correctly with proper UI updates

test_cases.name: File Download
test_cases.expected: Converted files download with correct names and formats

test_cases.name: Large File Handling
test_cases.expected: Large files handled with proper progress tracking

requirements.description: User interface should be responsive and accessible

test_cases.name: Responsive Design
test_cases.description: Test interface on different screen sizes
test_cases.expected: Interface adapts properly to different screen sizes

test_cases.name: Loading States
test_cases.expected: Loading states display during long operations

test_cases.name: Error Messages
test_cases.description: Test error message display and clarity
test_cases.expected: Errors displayed clearly with actionable information

test_cases.name: Keyboard Navigation
test_cases.expected: Interface accessible via keyboard with proper focus management

requirements.description: Application should perform well under normal usage

test_cases.name: Page Load Performance
test_cases.expected: Pages load within acceptable time limits

test_cases.name: Conversion Performance
test_cases.expected: Conversions complete within reasonable timeframes

test_cases.name: Memory Usage
test_cases.expected: Memory usage remains stable without leaks

requirements.description: Application should work across modern browsers

test_cases.name: Chrome Compatibility
test_cases.expected: All features work correctly in Chrome

test_cases.name: Firefox Compatibility
test_cases.expected: Application functions properly in Firefox

test_cases.name: Safari Compatibility
test_cases.expected: Application works correctly in Safari

test_environment.connection: Stable internet connection for CDN resources
